Gorilla Logic is a premier nearshore software development partner, providing Agile development teams to Fortune 500 and emerging companies. We bring unparalleled expertise in the delivery of full-stack web, mobile, and enterprise applications. Our Colorado headquarters and nearshore development hubs in Costa Rica, Colombia, and Mexico come together to build high-performance, integrated Agile teams with top-quality engineering talent. Our highly-collaborative developers work with your existing processes and work schedules to deliver game-changing results on your most critical products.

We pride ourselves on providing a true boutique consulting and software development experience that is personalized and customized to your unique business needs. Our deep talent pool of onshore and nearshore development resources is made up of experts in Java, Ruby, Python, .NET, Angular, React, iOS, and Android development.

company.name: Banco Caja Social
company.description:
El Banco Caja Social se ha orientado, durante más de 107 años, a la provisión de servicios financieros para los segmentos de menores ingresos de la población colombiana, es decir, hacia el mercado masivo con énfasis en la atención de sectores populares, microempresarios y pequeñas y medianas empresas; así como al sector inmobiliario y distintos segmentos del mercado de personas, contribuyendo al desarrollo del país y al progreso económico y social de estas personas y sus familias.

Banco Caja Social tiene 2,83 millones de clientes totales activos  y presencia en 69 municipios del país, con 268 oficinas, 3 extensiones, 2 servicajas y un centro de pagos, más de 3.452 cajeros automáticos; 750 propios y 2.702 en alianza con la red de Servibanca, 56 máquinas multifuncionales  y más de 1.600 Corresponsales Bancarios . Sus activos totales suman cerca de $1013,26 billones.

response.job_title: Mechanical Engineer with experience in management and leadership of Oil & Gas Projects. Universidad Nacional de Colombia / Master on Numerical Methods in Engineering - Universitat Politecnica de Catalunya
response.summary:
I am a Mechanical Engineer graduated in 2017 from the National University of Colombia, which allowed me to grow as a student and as a person; Once my undergraduate experience finished, I started working in a small company which allowed me to cover a wide range of activities as an engineer such as the CAD / CAE design of metal structures, continuous review of production processes in the plant, process assurance quality, among others, so I was able to experience many variables for my professional future.
From this, I managed to get my last job as a project manager, in this company I consolidated my leadership skills, personnel management, internal process logistics, in addition to understanding the entire design process of thermal equipment and pressure vessels following standards such as the ASME Code and the Tubular Exchanger Manufacturers Association TEMA.
All this experience allows me to have a strategic vision, as well as a more open mind to express and transmit ideas within a metalworking design and production process and to be able to complement any work team.
 I think that motivation in carrying out any activity can lead to unimaginable things, and my previous experience confirms that I will be able to take my work to new companies without any problem, providing all the energy possible to obtain all the objectives set.
response.skills: Manufactura, Negociación, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, AutoCAD, Gestión de proyectos, Matlab, Ingeniería, Microsoft Word, Inglés, Microsoft Power BI, Python, C++, Industria petrolera, Industria del petróleo y del gas

Internship carried out as part of the Master in Numerical Methods in Engineering at the UPC.
Main objectives:
-Search for information corresponding to research on fatigue in composite materials, especially in carbon fiber reinforced polymers (CFRP).
-Identification of mechanical properties of CFRP composites through the use of experimental and computational tests (Using software such as GiD & Kratos Multiphysics).
-Realization of static and dynamic simulations in CFRP.
-Extension with final master's project in verification of fatigue behavior in composite materials and life estimation under fatigue phenomenon.

company.name: BACHILLER
company.description:
BACHILLER is an industrial engineering company specialized in the design and construction of process equipment and pressure vessels for the chemical, petrochemical, fine chemical, pharmaceutical, cosmetic and food industries.

We provide solutions in pressure filtration, mixing and reaction of liquids and pastes, mixing, reaction and granulation of solids, vacuum drying, columns, tanks and pressure equipment, heat exchangers and reactors.

PRESSURE FILTERS
Nutsche Filters
Nutsche Filter Dryers

VACUUM DRYERS
Horizontal Vacuum Paddle Dryers
Vertical Vacuum Dryers
Vacuum Dryers Reactor for Solids

SOLID MIXERS
Vertical Mixers
Horizontal Mixers

LIQUID PROCESSING SYSTEMS
Liquid Mixers and Reactors
CIP Systems
Colloid Mills
Vacuum Deareators

AGITATED REACTORS

STATIC EQUIPMENT
Heat Exchangers
Distillation Columns
Pressure Vessels

Our services include project design, manufacturing of the equipment, laboratory tests, quality control and after sales.

We are present in more than 25 countries, directly or through our extensive network of representatives and local partners.

Spanish company founded in 1971. Our headquarter, manufacturing workshops and pilot plant are located in Parets del Vallés, 20 km from Barcelona. We have two production centers totaling more than 9,000m2.

QUALITY AND CERTIFICATIONS
Experience, investment in R & D & I and our high quality standards endorse us as world leaders. We have the quality certifications ISO 9001: 2008, U and U2 seal of ASME, HP0 certificate according to AD-2000 Merkblätt, Module H1 according to PED and A2 license according to SQL of the People's Republic of China.

company.name: Globant
company.description:
We are a digitally native company that helps organizations reinvent themselves to create a way forward and unleash their potential. We are the place where innovation, design and engineering meet scale.

- We have more than 27,000 employees and we are present in 25 countries working for companies like Google, Rockwell Automation, Electronic Arts and Santander, among others.

- We were also featured as a business case study at Harvard, MIT, and Stanford.

- We were named a Worldwide Leader in CX Improvement Services by IDC MarketScape report.

- We are a member of the Cybersecurity Tech Accord.

- At Globant, we believe that an inclusive culture and a diverse environment make us stronger. We are an equal opportunity employer (EOE M/F/D/V), always seeking to generate a place for inspiration and growth for everyone regardless of race, color, religion, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender identity, or veteran status.

- Our ultimate Diversity & Inclusion goal is to make Globant a respectful, safe, and inclusive workplace for all Globers where gender equality, cultural diversity, and inclusion are core to our DNA. 


For more information, visit https://bit.ly/globant_com

response.summary:
Ingeniero de Sistemas y Computación con capacidad de trabajo en equipo, disposición para el aprendizaje, fortaleza para tomar decisiones con objetividad y sólido compromiso con los objetivos que me propongo y los equipos a los que pertenezco. Me interesan y entusiasman los proyectos dirigidos al diseño e implementación de soluciones digitales en entornos empresariales, gubernamentales y sociales, ya que estos requieren del trabajo conjunto de especialistas en software, hardware, negocio, marketing y demás aspectos vitales para el éxito y cumplimiento de las metas propuestas.

Actualmente, continuo ampliando mi experiencia laboral, actitud, valores y ética buscando siempre mejorar en todas las actividades que desarrollo, logrando con ello alcanzar posiciones de mayor responsabilidad y reto. Así mismo, he liderado diversidad de proyectos digitales entre los cuales se encuentran migraciones de infraestructura a la nube, implementación de apps y sitios web responsive, células ágiles, CMS (AEM), DNS (Akamai), capas de integración (API Management y ESB), transformación digital, gestores de contenedores basados en Kubernetes, entre otros.
 
Uno de los objetivos más importantes que tengo a corto plazo es la realización de estudios que me permitan profundizar en temas de marketing digital.

Actualmente tengo una certificación de Big Data Engineer, SAFE y Scrum.
response.skills: Coordinación de equipos, Arquitectura de soluciones de software, Transformación digital, Desarrollo de software, Gestión de proyectos, Software Development, Arquitectura orientada a servicios, Ingeniería de software, Integración, Scrum, Almacanamiento de datos, Metodologías ágiles, Arquitectura de soluciones, Servicios web, Edición de imágenes, Big Data, Fotografía, Planificación estratégica, Estrategia empresarial, Liderazgo

company.description:
BNP Paribas Cardif plays an essential role in the lives of its policyholder clients, providing them with savings and protection solutions that let them realize their goals while protecting themselves from unforeseen events. We create solutions with almost 500 partner distributors in a variety of sectors.

With a presence in more than 30 countries and strong positions in three regions – Europe, Asia and Latin America – BNP Paribas Cardif is a global specialist in personal i#nsurance and a major contributor to financing for the real economy with nearly 8,000 employees worldwide.

company.name: Genius Sports
company.description:
From enabling sports to better collect and manage their data, to applying it to power better fan engagement, our technology and expertise delivers the difference to sports, betting and media partners around the world. 

Founded in 2001, Genius Sports is one of the world’s largest sports technology companies. We're headquartered in London and have offices in New York, Tallinn, Singapore, Lausanne, Manchester, Winter Springs, Los Angeles, Miami, Medellin, Sofia, Vilnius, Melbourne, Sydney, Bologna, Salerno, Shanghai and Zaporizhzhya.

Visit our Showcase Pages to discover more about our products for Clubs & Leagues, Sportsbooks, and Brands & Publishers.

company.name: AIESEC
company.description:
AIESEC develops leadership among youth aged 18 to 30 and contributes to strengthening the global employability market by providing an end-to-end international talent recruitment solution for Enterprises, NGOs, and Start-ups.

AIESEC is the world's largest youth-run organization developing the leadership potential of young people. Present in 120+ countries and territories across 2600 universities, we provide students and recent graduates with life-changing experiences to intern or volunteer abroad within partner organizations. 

We partner with organizations ranging from Fortune 500 to local enterprises in developing and sourcing their global talent needs across our network. Through our programs in universities, we provide organizations with access to a global network of young talent who have the capabilities to make a positive impact.

For the last seven decades, we have developed over one million leaders ranging from business, civil society, and world leaders, including one Nobel Peace Prize Laureate. 

Learn more about us at - http://partners.aiesec.org
